rules.name: myRule_1
rules.label: WTB Date is changed and not blank

value.stringValue: Post WTB (including parameters) on: MT, IC, Machinio, MLS, Rock and Dirt, and Mascus
Post WTB on FB Marketplace AND all FB equipment groups

Be sure to search for the parameters if there are any. Search in all 50 capital cities, with searches areound nearby areas: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1F4RB0bDeamwia4qt_R4ZtzsCvQP_P6y-80Ne3-y8q7Y/edit#gid=783013398&range=A1
Search Craigslist for comparable models within specific parameters
Schedule a WTB Mailchimp Email from sell@zadoon.com for this unit with the parameters
WTB - Look through sales@ email for any potential matches for this unit

recordCreates.name: myRule_1_A6
recordCreates.label: Post WTB on Fast Track Iron

value.stringValue: Post WTB on Fast Track Iron (can access app through the Sandhill Cloud login)
